name: Bloodworth Academy Occult Club
summary: After rebelling one too many times, your parents have enrolled you in a prestigious, secluded boarding school, hoping to set you straight. However, you quickly discover that your new campus is a playground for the supernatural. As if that wasn't surprising enough, you're forced by the school's rigorous rules to join a club or risk expulsion. Thankfully, the newly-established occult club offers you a spot, conditional on proving your worth.
